description:
Configuration to generate compounds with high affinity to a target protein.

    Implementation from the paper: https://doi.org/10.1088/2632-2153/abe808.

    Example:

    Assuming gt4sd_gen is the service name

    <cmd> gt4sd_gen generate with PaccMannRLProteinBasedGenerator data for 'GSQEVNSNASPEEAEIARKAGATTWTEKGNKWEIRI' sample 20  </cmd>

target.title: Target protein sequence
target.description: AA sequence of the protein target to generate non-toxic ligands against.

batch_size.title: Batch Size
batch_size.description: Batch size used for the generative model sampling.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Temperature parameter for the softmax sampling in decoding.

generated_length.title: Generated Length
generated_length.description: Maximum length in tokens of the generated molcules (relates to the SMILES length).
